history.proof: intros H1. destruct H1. - symmetry. auto. - contradiction.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
y: X
x: X

Goal:
x el [y] -> x = y

Premises:
ForallOrdPairs_In : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A), ForallOrdPairs R l -> forall x y : A, x el l -> y el l -> x = y \/ R x y \/ R y x
in_in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> x el l -> x el remove eq_dec y l
repeat_spec : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (x y : A), y el repeat x n -> y = x
in_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), x el l1 ++ y :: l2 -> x = y \/ x el l1 ++ l2
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x el remove eq_dec y l -> x el l /\ x <> y
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = [a] -> x = [] /\ y = [a] \/ x = [a] /\ y = []
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ [a] = y ++ [b] -> x = y /\ a = b
NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, x el l -> count_occ decA l x = 1)
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, a el ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type x : X y : X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type x : X y : X |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type x : X y : X |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type x : X y : X |- list ?A]
notin_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ x el l -> remove eq_dec x l = l
find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), find f l = None -> forall x : A, x el l -> f x = false
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> | remove eq_dec x l | < | l |
Inductive clos_refl (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := r_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x y | r_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x x Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_refl _%type_scope
forallb_forall : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), forallb f l = true < -> (forall x : A, x el l -> f x = true)
find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), find f l = Some x -> x el l /\ f x = true
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), x el l -> y el l' -> (x, y) el list_prod l l'
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {a el l} + {~ a el l}
count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
Pos.le = fun x y : positive => (x ?= y)%positive <> Gt : positive -> positive -> Prop Arguments Pos.le (_ _)%positive_scope
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
nodup : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A
remove_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ x el remove eq_dec x l
list_cc : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop) (A : list X), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x) -> {x : X | x el A /\ p x}
cfind : forall (A : list ?X) (p : ?X -> Prop), (forall x : ?X, dec (p x)) -> {x0 : ?X | x0 el A /\ p x0} + {forall x0 : ?X, x0 el A -> ~ p x0} where ?X : [X : Type x : X y : X |- Type]
count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> f x el map f l
list_forall_dec : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> dec (forall x : X, x el A -> p x)
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ a el l
In_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> exists n : nat, nth_error l n = Some x
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, x el l' < -> x el a :: l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), x el l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall x : A, P [x]) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> P (l ++ [y]) -> P ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x])) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P [] -> (forall x : A, P [x]) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> P (l ++ [y]) -> P ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x])) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x])
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, x el l -> P x)
rev_app_distr : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A), rev (x ++ y) = rev y ++ rev x
In_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x d : A), x el l -> exists n : nat, n < | l | /\ nth n l d = x
NoDup_count_occ : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, count_occ decA l x <= 1)

```  
intros H1.
destruct H1.
- intros.
  symmetry. assumption.
- intros H2.
  contradiction.
```

original: intros H1. destruct H1. - intros. symmetry. auto. - intros H2. contradiction.
